name: Luck of the Draw (GuhMan)
description:
Luck of the Draw is a top down shooter created in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice". Pick up guns and shoot dice at enemies, damaging them based on what you roll, and see if you can escape.

Movement:            W, A, S, & D

Aim:                            Mouse

Shoot:                        Left Click

Interact:                    E

Swap Weapon:      Q

Pause:                         Return

.

Creators:
